front.title: Reactions to Signaling from ECN Support for RTP/RTCP

abstract.t: This document presents recommendations for response to Congestion Experience (CE) notifications by real time applications that have negotiated end-to-end support of Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN). This document is a follow-on effort of [draft-rtp-ecn], which specifies the signaling used to provide ECN support for RTP/RTCP flows.
